data.title: Town of Calangianus ZIP 07023 (SS) Sardegna, Italy. Full data and useful information also on COVID
data.text:
Data about population living in Calangianus

NOTICE: in what follows data refers to Calangianus, where rises the City Hall of Calangianus, (and then not to the whole territory of Calangianus). For the sake of simplicity we will us the term of Calangianus.

In Calangianus live four thousand and eighty-six people: two thousand and thirty-three are males and two thousand and fifty-three are females.

There are one thousand, eight hundred and eighty-one singles (one thousand and twenty-five males and eight hundred and fifty-six females). There are one thousand, eight hundred and two people married, and eighty-three people legally separed. There are also fourty-four divorced people and two hundred and seventy-six widows and widowers.

Please find in what follows the table of the distribution of inhabitants by age.

Data about foreigners living in Calangianus

In Calangianus live eighty-five foreigners, thirty-one are males and fifty-four are females. 53 come from Europa, 25 from Africa, 6 from America, 1 from Asia and 0 from Oceania.

Please find in what follows the table of the distribution of foreigners by age.

Education in Calangianus

There are in Calangianus three thousand, nine hundred and thirty people in school age, one thousand, nine hundred and fifty-seven are males and one thousand, nine hundred and seventy-three females.

Employment rates and workers in Calangianus

There are in Calangianus 1827 people aged 15 years or more. 1516 are employed and 261 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 1106 males aged 15 years or more, 933 are employed and 149 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 721 females aged 15 years or more, 583 are employed and 112 s were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job.

Families and their compositions

There are in Calangianus 1534 families, for a total of 4070 people.

Please find in what follows a table showing the number of families along with the number of people for each family.

There are 1534 famiglie living in Calangianus. 258 live in rented houses, 1105 live in houses of their own property√Ç and 171 live in houses for different reasons.

The buildings and their characteristics in Calangianus

There are in Calangianus 1371 buildings, but only 1305 are used. 1182 buildings are for residential use, 123 buildings are for commercial or productive pourposes. Among the 1182 buildings for residential use 543 were build using bricks of tuffs, 597 were built using concrete and 42 were built using other materials like steel, wood and so on. Among the 1182 buildings for residential use 524 are in excellent condition, 537 are in good conditions, 119 are in mediocre conditions and 2 are in bad conditions.

In the following three tables the buildings built for residential use in Calangianus are classified by building year, by floors number and by rooms number.

Buildings in Calangianus by floors number

Buildings in Calangianus by rooms number
